name: Task Donegeon 2.0 - 0.4.77 - The Grand Arcade Expansion
description: Expanded the Arcade with six new minigames: Gemstone Mines, Labyrinth of the Minotaur, Alchemist's Trial, Goblin Ambush, River Crossing, and Wizard's Vortex. Also enhanced Tetris with a Hold Queue, Ghost Piece, and visual polish.
